goal: Generate a CLI tool structure for processing intents from the command line
constraints: Must use Node.js with ESM modules
Must accept intent file path as positional argument
Must support --output flag for specifying output directory
Must support --verbose flag for detailed logging
Must return exit code 0 on success, 1 on failure
Must include help text with --help flag
Must create bin entry point and package.json updates
Output must be a complete directory scaffold
